entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having a murky past and being involved in the Dark Arts in his youth. He is also described as not being broad-minded when he was younger.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as Dumbledore's brother who was convicted by the Wizengamot for misuse of magic.

entities.name: skeeter
entities.description: Skeeter is mentioned as the one referring to Dumbledore's past and laughing about it.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as someone that Dumbledore raged against.

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: The Wizengamot is mentioned as the organization that convicted Aberforth for misuse of magic.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Aberforth are brothers, with Aberforth being convicted by the Wizengamot for misuse of magic.
Skeeter is referring to Dumbledore's past and laughing about it.
